name: CrossBow Head and the Dangerous Dungeon of Doom!
name_original: CrossBow Head and the Dangerous Dungeon of Doom!
description:
WASD to Move

Aim and Click with the Mouse to Fire

Destroy all the slime demons to win, but don't touch them or their slime balls!

Fire your arrow at stone walls to make it reflect off and keep going, then catch it in mid air to get a bonus bullet time sequence. If your arrow hits a wood wall, it will get stuck and you will have to go pick it up
